subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: U.S.G.A. officials announced Friday that tickets for Day 1 of the U.S. Open would be honored on Monday. But if there is no play on Monday, Day 1 ticket holders will be given a 50 percent refund.
snippet: U.S.G.A. officials announced Friday that tickets for Day 1 of the U.S. Open would be honored on Monday. But if there is no play on Monday, Day 1 ticket holders will be given a 50 percent refund.
